topic.title: Plan Of Care Activity Supply - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode
SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::RQO or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRP
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass), where its data type is ActClassSupply

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode
SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::RQO or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRP
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::RQO or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRP

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <supply xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25"/> <id root="bf35503d-cd3d-48ad-9365-56ee1d2e34ca"/> <effectiveTime value="20110616"/> </supply>
